title: Champion concept - Leina, The guardian of the wandering forests
body:
Leina is an _Ability Powered Marksman_, who like all other ADC use basic attacks to kill their enemies. The previous problem with AP marksmen {{champion:10}} {{champion:17}} is they can not critically strike. So instead, she has other ways of killing tanks in her kit. Much like Vayne, Leina has a weak laning phase with not much ability to poke. But is rewarded with a hyper carry late game. If played correctly, Leina will be able to run around teamfights deleting people without being able to be pinned down. 

Passive - A Guardians Weapon
Leina carries an ancient relic, an ornate wooden bow. Every time Leina auto attacks, her bow fires 3 extra bullets rapidly, dealing small magic damage with each bullet (Scaling off Ability Power). Additionally, every time Leina auto attacks she is given a stack of _A Guardians Weapon_, increasing her attack speed by 4%. This stacks 5 times for a maximum 20% increase attack speed (resets after 3 seconds of not attacking)

Q - The Forest's Assailment 
Leina nimbly dashes forward a small distance, this can not pass terrain. But it resets her auto attack timer.

W - Wisp of the wild
Leina passively deals extra damage to targets with higher current health than her (3% for every 250 health, maxing at 12% increased damage)
Every time Leina auto attacks, her movement speed is increased by 20, this stacks 5 times and resets after 3 seconds of not attacking. 

E - Tenatious Undergrowth
Leina roots a target for a small amount of time and deals moderate magic damage (the duration scales off her maximum attack speed)

R - The Wandering Forest's Blessing
Leina blesses herself in the name of the wandering forest, giving her additional buffs on her other abilities for 8 seconds.

Passive - Basic attacks give Leina 2 stacks of a Guardians Weapon and max at 6 stacks. 
Damage from _A Guardians Weapon_ deal 4% of the targets maximum health in extra magic damage. 

Q - Resets the cooldown to 2/1.5/1 second regardless of CDR

Reccomended build:

Essential: {{item:3157}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3115}} 

Offensive: {{item:3020}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3124}} 

Situational: {{item:3116}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3151}} 

If you have any reccomendations on how to balance her please comment, it only helps me do something differently.

replies.body:
Her passive sounds like a Lulu passive with Wit's End attack speed passive applied.
Also, as a marksman, she should have more damaging abilities.
If you've noticed, e is usually the dash on champions, not q.
I like the concept, but a bit underpowered and gameplay would be hard.
